title: Hello world
Inactive_account_description: Your account has already been created in absentify, but it is not yet active. This is because the configuration process by the Administration/HR is not yet complete. If you believe this is an error, you can send a reminder to the administrator using the button below.
Deactivated_account_description: Your account has been disabled by an administrator. Contact an administrator in your your company if you need access to absentify.
Community_Description: This language has not been translated by the absentify team, but is translated by the community.
Community_Description2: We translate everything with AI, this chart shows how much of the texts have already been validated or improved by the community. If you have any errors or improvements, feel free to help us make the changes here:
absentify_plan_ready_to_use: ðŸŽ‰ absentify plan is now ready to use!
Inactive_subscription_description_user: The payment for the subscription hasn't been made by the administrators yet. Please contact your administrators to continue using absentify.
Inactive_subscription_description_admin: The payment for your subscription hasn't been processed. Please settle the outstanding amount to reactivate the absentify service.
past_due_announcement_title_short: Your access will be revoked if payment is not made by {{endDate}}.
past_due_announcement_title_long: You have an outstanding payment. If it is not settled by {{endDate}}, your access will be revoked. Please update your payment information to continue using the service.
